name: Tetris3D
description:
Tetris in 3D

  • The normal mode can be played using keyboard (arrows and space).
  • The hard mode needs  screen touch (phone or pad...) to turn the cubes of the bricks. A full line is accepted just if the front face colors of all the cubes are the same.
  • The score and the level are saved. you can reset them in the settings menu.
